name: Untitled Bad Game
description:
This is a game I made just to finish It.

Oh yeah, I have a Youtube Channel:

 https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOkChqU62FeV8wcHT50nH5A/videos

Instructions:

WASD Or Arrow keys to move.

Color all the blocks by moving towards them.

You can't move towards colored blocks.

If you get stuck, Press R to restart.
